name: Sakaryaspor
description: ## What Is Sakaryaspor Token (SKRY)? Sakaryaspor Token is the official fan token of the Sakaryaspor Football Club, a sports club taking place in the TFF 2. League. SKRY is the fan token that is used for: * Enabling fans to engage and communicate with the Sakaryaspor Football Club * Receiving gifts, accessing privileges, discounts, special events. ## How Many SKRY Tokens Are There in Circulation? Sakaryaspor Token launched on October 21, 2021 with 154 Million SKRY tokens created at genesis. %30 of the tokens sold out at pre-sale on Bitexen. %50 of the tokens are locked to be equally released annually each year. %20 of the tokens will be used for marketing and development. ### Who Are the Founders of SKRY Token ? Sakaryaspor Token ($SKRY) project is launched in cooperation with [ExenPay](https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/exenpay-token), [Bitexen](https://www.coingecko.com/en/exchanges/bitexen/) and Sakaryaspor Football Club. ### Where Can I Buy Sakaryaspor Token (SKRY)? SKRY is available for trading on [Bitexen](https://www.coingecko.com/en/exchanges/bitexen), one of the largest exchanges in Turkey, available.
